metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11113 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In ncurses 6.0, there is a NULL Pointer Dereference in the _nc_parse_entry function of tinfo/parse_entry.c. It could lead to a remote denial of service attack if the terminfo library code is used to process untrusted terminfo data.

notes.Note: ccdm94> fix availabe in patch 20170701 for ncurses 6.0.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
